#summary Download instructions and files.

[http://code.google.com/p/sfepy/downloads/list (All downloads)]

*Latest released sources:*

  http://sfepy.googlecode.com/files/sfepy-release-2008.4.tgz

*Git repository:*

  * download the repository:
{{{
git clone git://git.sympy.org/sfepy.git
}}}

  * web access :

    http://git.sympy.org/?p=sfepy.git

  * latest snapshot:

    http://git.sympy.org/?p=sfepy.git;a=snapshot;h=HEAD;sf=tgz

* Old mercurial repository:*

  * download the repository:
{{{
hg clone http://hg.sympy.org/sfepy
}}}

  * web access :
    http://hg.sympy.org/sfepy
